4.doc: If Horizontal is true, bars will be displayed from left to right. Can be combined with Horizontal.
4.name: Horizontal

5.doc: If Stacked is true, multiple series get stacked on top of each other. Can be combined with Horizontal.
5.name: Stacked

7.doc: Labels for the series data, shown on the x-axis for vertical bar charts and the y-axis for horizontal ones. By default, these labels are taken from the x value of each BarChartDataPoint, but you can override them by providing this array of strings.
7.name: Labels

8.doc: The BarChart is per default downloadable. By setting Downloadable to false the toolbar to download the BarChart gets hidden.
8.name: Downloadable
